snippet.title: Into Death and Beyond - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Into Death and Beyond is a gripping first-person survival horror set on the mysterious and hostile planet XB32-ENT, where you play as Mark Helkins, a bounty hunter on a mission to capture a rogue alien mutation created by the dark experiments of the GenHaptics Corporation. Following a crash landing, you’re left stranded with only limited resources, facing dangerous creatures and the haunting remnants of a disastrous genetic experiment.

Key Features:

Survival Horror at Its Core: Scavenge for limited resources like plasma ammunition and health kits as you fight for survival. Your weapon can only kill enemies with precise headshots, adding a layer of strategy and tension to every encounter.

Exploration and Puzzle-Solving: Investigate eerie, claustrophobic labs filled with environmental puzzles and hidden logs that reveal the dark history of the experiments. Discover and combine the critical components to build a powerful weapon capable of taking down your ultimate prey.

Dynamic and Non-Linear Gameplay: Explore three distinct laboratories at your own pace in a semi-open world. The planet’s dense atmosphere shrouds everything in mist, hiding dangers and creating constant tension.

Cinematic Storytelling: Experience a dark narrative filled with mystery, corporate corruption, and a chilling final twist. Your mission: capture the alien entity and escape—before it hunts you down.

Terrifying Atmosphere: A combination of post-apocalyptic environments, oppressive fog, and eerie sound design inspired by survival horror classics immerse you in a world where survival is not guaranteed.

Can You Survive and Complete Your Mission?

Fight your way through deadly mutants, uncover the truth behind the experiments, and escape with the alien specimen. But remember—some horrors are best left undiscovered.
